name: Boom Squad (itch)
description:
Boom Squad is a 3rd person platformer shooter brought to life into a starter e-sport, defined by realistic gun combat, placed in 5 v 5 online multiplayer matches.

KEY FEATURES

Realistic gun combat placed in 5 v 5 online multiplayer matches, you can join solo or with a party

  • The key to winning is to combine the fast-paced skill with cooperative gameplay and real-time tactics
  • Several characters available, addressing different combat types like offensive, defensive and support 
  • RPG-like progression based on an extensive tech tree of firearms; characters can also evolve outside their assigned role depending on player's choice.
NEWS 

Boom Squad will release on Steam Early Access in April 2018.

Meanwhile, we're planning on releasing small updates, at every week, to push bug fixes, client & server performance and new content.

As always, we take all feedback on-board, so help us build the game you want to play.  Join our Discord: https://discord.me/playboomsquad
